events.title: Coding Bootcamp: Python Fundamentals
events.description: Hands-on workshop covering Python basics, data structures, and practical applications. Perfect for beginners ready to dive into programming.

events.title: Building Your Personal Brand in Tech
events.description: Learn strategies to establish your online presence, craft your narrative, and stand out in the competitive tech industry.

events.title: Women in AI: A Fireside Chat
events.description: Join us for an inspiring conversation with leading women in artificial intelligence and machine learning about their journeys and insights.

events.title: FinTech Innovation Workshop
events.description: Explore the intersection of finance and technology. From blockchain to digital payments, discover what's shaping the future of money.

events.title: Annual GWiST Summit 2026
events.description: Our flagship event celebrating women in STEM with keynotes, panels, networking sessions, and a showcase of groundbreaking student projects.

events.title: ML + Computer Vision Deep Dive
events.description: Advanced workshop on machine learning applications in computer vision. Build real-world projects and learn from industry practitioners.

events.title: Tech Career Fair & Networking Mixer
events.description: Connect with recruiters, alumni, and fellow students. Practice your pitch, explore opportunities, and expand your professional network.

events.title: Design Thinking for Engineers
events.description: Learn human-centered design principles and apply them to technical problem-solving. A hands-on workshop for creative engineers.
